definition: to lean against/to rely on/on the basis of/no matter (how, what etc)/proof
according to/in accordance with/to shine/to illuminate/to reflect/to look at (one's reflection)/to take (a photo)/photo/as requested/as before

historical communal administrative and self-defence system created during the Song Dynasty and revived during the Republican Era, in which households are grouped in jia 甲[jia3] and jia are grouped in bao 保[bao3]
security measures (esp. border security)/official seal (esp. military seal during Qing and Ming times)
to open up land for cultivation
to handle in accordance with (the rules)
local militia formed to suppress peasant rebellion (old)
(literary) to inform (the public)/to give clear instructions/public announcement (from higher authorities)
